data.title: Lida, Nevada
data.meta_description: is a small town in Esmeralda County, Nevada, near the border with California. It is located on State Route 266, north of Magruder Mountain.Like other mining towns in Esmeralda County, its population sharply declined once the mines were exhausted
data.text:
Lida, Nevada is a small town in Esmeralda County, Nevada, near the border with California. It is located on State Route 266, north of Magruder Mountain.

Like other mining towns in Esmeralda County, its population sharply declined once the mines were exhausted. Lida is listed on some websites as a ghost town, but there are still people living there.
